name: HyperTrends Global Inc.
tagline: Smart Software For The Connected World
description:
Hello,
We are HyperTrends Global Inc., an award-winning Software Development Agency based out of San Diego, CA with operations in India, Ukraine and Costa Rica just to name a few.
We pride ourselves with building the highest quality SaaS Platforms, REST based APIs, Web based and Native Mobile Apps for Startups and Enterprises alike.
It is our mission to build Smart Technology Solutions for the Connected World.
We promise the best rates in the industry because we have a unique development methodology and have over 15yrs of experience building software solutions. Time and time again, we have delivered the significantly higher quality software for the price we charge our customers. A large part of that is attributed to the software libraries we have built for reuse.
If you are in the market for a company whose personnel have worked in some of the leading Startups in SoCal and also have Enterprise experience, we are here to engage.
We have built software for Education, Mortgage, Telematics, FinTech, Blockchain, Entertainment, Travel, Event Management, Lead Gen and Manufacturing verticals and have amassed massive experience and have proven expertise to deliver.
We build software using .NET, C#, Python, MongoDB, SQL Server, PostGreSQL, React JS, NodeJS, Microsoft Service Fabric, Microsoft Azure, RabbitMQ, Golang, Solidity/Ethereum just to name a few.
We pride ourselves in offering the best working conditions for our employees and are a fully distributed team with flexible working hours and have an employee retention rate of over 8 years.
Our team regularly hosts webinars and training session videos on YouTube to guide other development teams build high quality software.
To learn more, call us at: 800-626-3503. We will be more than happy to chat.
